about.title: about
about.about:
This is a simple and private notebook. In the browser.
This site does not transmit data to the Internet, does not track users.
If you have questions, feel free to write to info@jiff.be.

manage.title: manage
content:
Here you can manage your entries. It's like that.
We do not force you to save notes here for any reason.
You can {0} them or {1} everything to one.{2}And if you suddenly want to restore exported entries, {3} them.
